```{r}
library(tidyverse)    # System of packages for data manipulation 
library(tidyselect)   # Backend for selecting functions of the tidyverse
library(magrittr)     # To include pipe like operator %>%
library(readr)        # Package to read data, .csv files
library(lubridate)    # To handle date time data
library(data.table)   # Data structure 
library(hms)
library(dplyr)

theme_pack <- theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 12),
                    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
                    strip.text = element_text(size = 10))
```

# Plot by CZ_145
```{r}
CZ4_145 <- read_csv("input/cz4_145.csv")
```


```{r}
to_kWh <- 3.412 #conversion from kBtu(th) to kWh

CZ4_145 <- CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc / to_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_bc / to_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc / to_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6 / to_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_3_to_6 /to_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         #multifamily
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_bc / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_bc / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_bc / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_bc_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_bc / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_3_to_6_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_3_to_6 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_MF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_MF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_MF_10_to_1 / to_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_10_to_1_kWh = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_MF_10_to_1 / to_kWh)
```

#ERWH
climate zone 4 () overheat to 145F
```{r}
CZ4_145_SF_summary_ERWH <- CZ4_145 %>%
  group_by(Mon,Hr) %>%
  summarise(avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh = mean(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh), 
            avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh = mean(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh), 
            avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh = mean(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh))

CZ4_145_SF_summary_ERWH_melted <- CZ4_145_SF_summary_ERWH %>% gather(key = "wh_type", value = "kwh", c(-Mon,-Hr))
ggplot(CZ4_145_SF_summary_ERWH_melted, aes(x = Hr, y = kwh)) + geom_line(aes(color = wh_type)) + theme_gray(base_size = 13) + facet_wrap("Mon") +
  labs(x ="Hour of Day", y= "Energy (kWh)") +
    theme_pack +
  
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(4,8,12,16,20,24)) +
  scale_color_manual(name="Case Type", 
                        labels = c("10 to 1", 
                                   "3 to 6", 
                                   "base case"), 
                        values = c("avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh" = "red", 
                                   "avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh" = "blue", 
                                   "avg_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh" = "black"))
```

#climate zone 1 natural gas
```{r}
to_therm <- 100.06696068911 #conversion from kBtu(th) to therm

CZ4_SF_NG <- CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(Dhw_CZ4_therm = Dhw_CZ4_NG / to_therm)

CZ4_145_SF_summary_NG <- CZ4_SF_NG %>%
  group_by(Mon,Hr) %>%
  summarise(avg_Dhw_CZ4_NG_therm = mean(Dhw_CZ4_therm))

CZ4_SF_NG_mltd <- CZ4_145_SF_summary_NG %>% gather(key = "cz", value = "therm", c(-Mon,-Hr))
ggplot(CZ4_SF_NG_mltd, aes(x = Hr, y = therm)) + geom_line(aes(color = cz)) + theme_gray(base_size = 13) + facet_wrap("Mon") + labs(x ="Hour of Day", y= "Energy (Therms)")+
   # ggtitle("Natural Gas Water Heater - Single Family") +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))  +
    theme_pack +
  
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(4,8,12,16,20,24)) +
  scale_color_manual(name="Case Type", 
                        labels = c("Natural Gas"), 
                        values = c("avg_Dhw_CZ4_NG_therm" = "black"))
```

```{r}
#multiple 8760 hours of kWh by GHG marignal emissions
ghg_cz4 <- data.frame(dayofyear = GHG_NP_hour$dayOfyear, Hr = GHG_NP_hour$Hr, ghg = GHG_NP_hour$GHG_hourly_north) %>%
group_by(dayofyear) %>% 
  summarise(ghg = sum(ghg))
  
ggplot(ghg_cz4, aes(x=ghg)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.20) + geom_vline(aes(xintercept=mean(ghg)),
            color="blue", linetype="dashed", size=1)
```


Create mix sccenario in data.frame
```{r}
require(data.table)

ghg_e_cz4 <- data.table(dayofyear = GHG_NP_hour$dayOfyear, 
                                erwh_bc_kwh = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh, 
                                erwh_3_to_6 = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh, 
                                erwh_10_to_1 = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh,
                        
                                hpwh_bu_kWh = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_kWh,
                                hpwh_bu_3_to_6_kWh = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh + CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_kWh,
                                hpwh_bu_10_to_1_kWh = CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh + CZ4_145$Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_kWh
                                )

ghg_cz4_dt <- as.data.table(ghg_cz4)

setkey(ghg_e_cz4, dayofyear)
setkey(ghg_cz4_dt, dayofyear)

ghg_e_cz4 <- ghg_cz4_dt[ghg_e_cz4]
ghg_e_cz4[ , mixed_case_3_to_6 := erwh_bc_kwh]
ghg_e_cz4[ ghg < 7.5 , mixed_case_3_to_6 := erwh_3_to_6]
ghg_e_cz4[ , mixed_case_10_to_1 := erwh_bc_kwh]
ghg_e_cz4[ ghg < 7.5 , mixed_case_10_to_1 := erwh_10_to_1]

ghg_e_cz4[ , hpwh_mixed_case_3_to_6 := hpwh_bu_kWh]
ghg_e_cz4[ ghg < 7.5 , hpwh_mixed_case_3_to_6 := hpwh_bu_3_to_6_kWh]
ghg_e_cz4[ , hpwh_mixed_case_10_to_1 := hpwh_bu_kWh]
ghg_e_cz4[ ghg < 7.5 , hpwh_mixed_case_10_to_1 := hpwh_bu_10_to_1_kWh]

CZ4_145 <- CZ4_145 %>%
  data.frame(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed = ghg_e_cz4$mixed_case_3_to_6,
             Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed = ghg_e_cz4$mixed_case_10_to_1,
             Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed = ghg_e_cz4$hpwh_mixed_case_3_to_6,
             Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed = ghg_e_cz4$hpwh_mixed_case_10_to_1)
  
```


```{r}
# numbers from PG&E rate structure
peak_summer <- 0.39757 
off.peak_summer <- 0.29451

peak_winter <- 0.26011
off.peak_winter <- 0.24131 

summer <- c(5:10)
winter <- c(1:4,11,12)

# rate strcuture for EV fleet
peak.hr <- c(16:21)
off.peak.hr <- c(1:15,22:24)

rate_therm <- 0.30

CZ4_145 <-
  CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(time = as.hms(Hr))

CZ4_145 <- CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(Dhw_CZ4_therm = Dhw_CZ4_NG / to_therm)

# build in rate structure
CZ4_145 <-
  CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(rate = case_when(second(as.hms(Hr)) %in% peak.hr & Mon %in% winter ~ peak_winter,                                                                 second(as.hms(Hr)) %in% peak.hr & Mon %in% summer ~ peak_summer,
                          second(as.hms(Hr)) %in% off.peak.hr & Mon %in% winter ~ off.peak_winter,
                          second(as.hms(Hr)) %in% off.peak.hr & Mon %in% summer ~ off.peak_summer))

CZ4_145 <-
  CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_cost = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh * rate, 
         #Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_cost = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_kWh * rate, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_kWh * rate, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_bc_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_cost + Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_cost,
        
         
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_cost = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh * rate, 
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_mixed_cost = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed * rate,
         #Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_cost = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh * rate, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_cost + Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_cost,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_cost_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed * rate,
         
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_cost = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_mixed_cost = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed * rate,
         #Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_cost = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_kWh * rate,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_cost + Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_cost,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_cost_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed * rate,
         
         Dhw_CZ4_therm_cost = Dhw_CZ4_therm * rate_therm)
```

#plot cost
```{r}
CZ4_145_cost_summary <- CZ4_145 %>%
  group_by(Mon) %>%
  summarise(total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_cost), 
            #total_Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_cost), 
            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_bc_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_bc_cost),
            
            total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_cost), 
            total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_mixed_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_mixed_cost),
            #total_Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_cost), 
            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost),
            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost_mixed = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_cost_mixed),
            
            total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_cost),
            total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_mixed_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_mixed_cost),
            #total_Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_cost),
            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost),
            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost_mixed = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_cost_mixed),
            
            total_Dhw_CZ4_therm_cost = sum(Dhw_CZ4_therm_cost))


CZ4_145_cost_summary <- subset(CZ4_145_cost_summary, select = -Mon)
annualCost <- data.frame(wh_type = names(CZ4_145_cost_summary), annual_cost = colSums(CZ4_145_cost_summary))

annualCost <- 
  annualCost %>% 
    mutate(type = case_when(wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_cost" ~ "ERWH",
                                 #wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ3_HPWH_SF_bc_cost" ~ "HPWH",
                                 wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_bc_cost" ~ "HPWH_bu",
                            
                                 wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_cost" ~ "ERWH",
                                  wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_mixed_cost" ~ "mixed ERWH",
                                 #wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_cost" ~ "HPWH",
                                 wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost" ~ "HPWH_bu",
                                 wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_cost_mixed" ~ "mixed HPWH_bu",
                            
                           wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_cost" ~ "ERWH",
                           wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_mixed_cost" ~ "mixed ERWH",
                           #wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_cost" ~ "HPWH",
                           wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost" ~ "HPWH_bu",
                           wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_cost_mixed" ~ "mixed HPWH_bu",
                           
                           wh_type == "total_Dhw_CZ4_therm_cost" ~ "NGWH"))

#annualCost <- colSums(CZ1_145_cost_summary[,c(2:11)]) %>%

ggplot(annualCost, aes(x = wh_type , y = annual_cost)) + geom_col(aes(fill = type)) + theme_gray(base_size = 13) + labs(x = "Case Scenario", y = "Cost ($)") +
```

```{r}
co2_per_kWh <- 0.524 #lbs CO2 per kWh
co2_per_therm <- 13.446 #lbs CO2 per therm

CZ4_145 <-
  CZ4_145 %>%
  mutate(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_kWh * co2_per_kWh, 
        # Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_GHG = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_kWh * co2_per_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_kWh * co2_per_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_bc_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_bc_GHG + Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_bc_GHG,
         
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh * co2_per_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_GHG_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed * co2_per_kWh, 
        # Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_GHG = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_3_to_6_kWh * co2_per_kWh, 
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_GHG +Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_3_to_6_GHG,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_3_to_6_GHG_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_3_to_6_kWh_mixed * co2_per_kWh,
         
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_GHG_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed * co2_per_kWh,
        # Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_GHG = Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_10_to_1_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_kWh * co2_per_kWh,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_GHG + Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu2_SF_10_to_1_GHG,
         Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_GHG_mixed = Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_bu_SF_10_to_1_kWh_mixed * co2_per_kWh,
         
         Dhw_CZ4_therm_GHG = Dhw_CZ4_therm * co2_per_therm)


CZ4_145_GHG_summary <- CZ4_145 %>%
 # group_by(Mon) %>%
  summarise(total_Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_GHG = sum(Dhw_CZ4_ERWH_SF_bc_GHG), 
            #total_Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_GHG = sum(Dhw_CZ1_HPWH_SF_bc_GHG),

            total_Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_GHG_mixed = sum(Dhw_CZ4_HPWH_backup_SF_10_to_1_GHG_mixed),
            
            total_Dhw_CZ4_therm_GHG = sum(Dhw_CZ4_therm_GHG))
```
